[i]The final suit designed by Tony Stark - Hall of Armor Files[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Suit.
Destroy target creature.
Each Suit you control gets +2/+2 and give equipped creatures +2/+2 until end of turn.

This equipment based deck uses Iron Man's suits as both creatures and equipment through the reconfigure keyword. Each creature can be both a stand alone creature or equip to other creatures you control to make them stronger. Utilize the adaptability of the Iron Man suits to achieve victory.
